text: B.B Comer was an American Democratic Party politician who served as governor of Alabama from 1907 to 1911. A number of social reforms were carried out during his time in office.MESSAGE OF GOV. BRAXTON BRAGG COMER TO THE MEMBERS OF THE SENATE AND HOUSEGov. Braxton Bragg Comer biographyHistory of Alabama by Albert Burton Moore, Ph.D., 1951, P.671-672Alabama legislative acts, 1909 (general and local, special session)Acts of the General Assembly of the state of Alabama 1907 Gen. ==References== Category:Governors of Alabama Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: B. B. Comer
